title: Develop Story Idea from Public Data
description: A data journalist browses a city's open data portal looking for potential stories.

tasks.description: Scan the city's open data portal for newly released or interesting datasets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a dataset on restaurant health code violations.

tasks.description: Download and analyze the dataset, looking for patterns or outliers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that violations have increased by 50% in the last year.

tasks.description: Formulate a story pitch based on the finding: 'Restaurant health code violations are on the rise across the city.'
tasks.expected_outcome: A data-driven story idea is developed.
